::Grounded::
Grounded sees the new bot come in and calls out"Hey come get me you
peice of scrap" in an attempt to even the odds...


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Dead-End::
> He had left later than Wildrider, and was just flying into at the
> scene. He sees Wildrider, up high, and follows, firing two Psi
> punches from his Air-compression cannon at Windlord. "Haha, hey
> Wildrider, guess who just joined the party."
>
>
> On 31 Mar 2001, at 6:51, airly2000@y... wrote:
>
> > Windlord::
> >
> > "I can handle him" said the hawk while he shoot 25 times agaisnt
> > Wildrider...

> >

> > > ::Grounded::
> > > "Shit , i cant do anyting while he is up there...." he said to
> > > himself....He glanced down and saw some oil leaking out from where
> > he
> > > was kniked by Wildrider's scatter shot..."I am clear out of ideas"
> > he
> > > relayed to Wind " and i am basically usless right now....can u out
> > run
> > > him...?"
> > >
> > >

> > small
